# Using source-highlight convert python code to html # this will be better when we can use this to # create a new document. --But we can???
lang=$(tr <<<$TM_SCOPE \ \\n|grep source.|tail -n1|perl -pe 's/source\.([^.]*).*/$1/')
case "$lang" in c) lang="cpp" ;; c++) lang="cpp" ;; objc) lang="cpp" ;; objc++) lang="cpp" ;; php) lang="php3" ;; ocaml) lang="caml" ;; esac expand -3 | "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH"/source-highlight --line-number --src-lang=$lang --out-format=xhtml
